name: Jet & Sky
description:
Jet & Sky is a cooperative shoot ‘em up for 2 players
where teamwork is key when it comes to
saving the day.

Gameplay

One player plays as Jet, the astute driver who’ s
in charge of getting all the bonuses and avoiding
obstacles and enemy attacks.

The other plays as Sky, the fearless gunner
who has to point and shoot in order to take
down every last criminal.

And together, they will have to stop the
greatest threat the human race has
ever confronted!

Missions

The game will have 12 chapters (9
from the main story and 3 unlockable
bonus) in which the difficulty will
increase as players advance.

Story

Jet and Sky are two old friends from high school
who dedicate their lives to protecting the city from
criminals that threat to disturb the safety everyday.
For this, they are equipped with Sarah3000, the
latest in artificial intelligence for jetskis.

After an encounter with their old nemesis Prof.
Greed, Jet and Sky make a horrible discover. Evil Dr.
Jenkins, a mad scientist who hates everyone for rejecting
his crazy experiments, is building an army of
cyborg animals and is planning to invade The City.
Jet and Sky are the only ones who can stop him, but
they didn’t expect him to have a trap that would
send them to another planet.

Can Jet and Sky return to Earth before it’s too late?
